'''Sissy''' is an unnamed minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. She is played by guest star [[Jane McGrath]] debuts in "[[Oathkeeper]]".
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there's no mention of a daughter-wife of Craster called Sissy.
sections.Behind the scenes: The character's name is never mentioned onscreen or in credits. It is mentioned in the actress's CV.<ref>[http://www.lisarichards.ie/actorsf/jane-mcgrath-actor#.U3hWt_l5MkK]</ref>
